properties.entry: SELECT CATEGORY_NO, CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY ORDER BY 1

SELECT BOARD_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_ID, COUNT, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER ON(BOARD_WRITER = MEMBER_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_NO, BOARD_TYPE, CATEGORY_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_WRITER ) VALUES ( SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, 1, ?, ?, ?, ? )
